bioconda.name: cyvcf2
bioconda.summary: A cython wrapper around htslib built for fast parsing of Variant Call Format (VCF) files

biocontainers.name: cyvcf2
biocontainers.summary: Library and software package for fast parsing and querying of vcf and bcf files and illustrate its speed, simplicity and utility.

biotools.summary: Library and software package for fast parsing and querying of VCF and BCF files and illustrate its speed, simplicity and utility.

bioschemas.name: cyvcf2
bioschemas.summary: Library and software package for fast parsing and querying of VCF and BCF files and illustrate its speed, simplicity and utility.
